org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.particle

Class ParticleBlur

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.particle.Particle
      • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.particle.ParticleBlur

  • public class ParticleBlur
extends net.minecraft.client.particle.Particle
    A blurred static fading particle with any possible color.

        Make a new instance.
        Parameters:
        world - The world.
        x - X coordinate.
        y - Y coordinate.
        z - Z coordinate.
        scale - The scale of this particle.
        motionX - The X motion speed.
        motionY - The Y motion speed.
        motionZ - The Z motion speed.
        red - Red tint.
        green - Green tint.
        blue - Blue tint.
        ageMultiplier - The multiplier of the maximum age (this will be multiplied with a partially random factor).
